properties.name: maxRetries
properties.summary: If an EBUSY, EMFILE, ENFILE, ENOTEMPTY, or EPERM error is encountered, Node.js will retry the operation with a linear backoff wait of retryDelay milliseconds longer on each try. This option represents the number of retries. This option is ignored if the recursive option is not true.

properties.name: recursive
properties.summary: If true, perform a recursive removal. In recursive mode operations are retried on failure.

properties.name: retryDelay
properties.summary: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait between retries. This option is ignored if the recursive option is not true.
